## importa dados
#Teste de hip√≥teses (Teste T)

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(readxl)

mg<- read_excel("C:dados-diversos.xlsx")
```

```{r}
mg |> 
  ggplot(aes(trat, comp))+
  geom_jitter(width =0.05)+
  geom_boxplot(fill = NA, 
               outlier.colour = NA)+
  ylim(5, 20)+
  annotate(geom = "text",
           x = 0.7, y = 19,
           label = "t = 8.12; P < 0.001;")
```

```{r}
mg |> 
  
  ggplot(aes(trat, comp))+
  stat_summary(fun.data = "mean_se")
  
  

```

```{r}
mg2 <- mg |> 
  pivot_wider(1, 
              names_from = trat,
              values_from = comp)
```

```{r}
t <- t.test(mg2$Mg2, mg2$control)
t
library(report)
report(t)
```

## Using the infer package

```{r}
library(infer)
mg |> 
  t_test(comp ~ trat,
         order = c("control", "Mg2"))



```
